Game.Name: Groove Adventure Rave - Hikari to Yami no Daikessen (Japan)
Game.plot: Groove Adventure Rave: Hikari to Yami no Daikessen is an Action game, published by Konami,which was released in Japan in 2002.Cheat: Unlocking charactersBeat Story Mode with all 8 initial characters. The last character used to beat Story Mode will face Lucia. Lucia will now be available as a final boss everytime you go through Story Mode with any character.
